assertions.assertion:
The function will compare the string pointed to by s1 to the string pointed to by s2. Upon completion, function will return an integer greater than 0, if the string pointed to by s1 is greater than the string pointed to by s2.
The function will compare the string pointed to by s1 to the string pointed to by s2. Upon completion, function will return an integer equal to 0, if the string pointed to by s1 is equal to the string pointed to by s2.
The function will compare the string pointed to by s1 to the string pointed to by s2. Upon completion, function will return an integer less than 0, if the string pointed to by s1 is less than the string pointed to by s2.
